name: Mystere: Fuga Dal Castello di Lockness
overview: Mystere: Fuga Dal Castello di Lockness is an Italian language Adventure game, developed and published by Genias, which was released in Europe in 1990. A quest to escape from Lockness Castle, which houses a painting so sublime that if you could get it you would be lord of the adventurers and would be borne home on the wings of angels, where eternal bliss would await you.
